body_html:
I think it's possible to get it down to just the dependency on protobuf.h
(I have a change somewhere where I did that, but it was ultimately not
needed). Would that help? The protobuf.h code would still need to be made
available somehow.

On Mon, Jul 18, 2016 at 5:31 PM, Andrew Harp notifications@github.com
wrote:

It's generated by the cc_binary tool gen_proto_text_functions, which only
uses the following basic TF includes:
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/lib/strings/str_util.h"
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/lib/strings/strcat.h"
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/macros.h"
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/types.h"
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/init_main.h"
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/logging.h"
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/protobuf.h"

The entirety of platformlib apart from protos_cc should not be required
for this binary, so maybe there is some way to refactor the targets
involved.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AQw4wTIMRhpw5AqW_-mgPcWCNpet80S1ks5qXBr3gaJpZM4JPJoG
.

body:
I think it's possible to get it down to just the dependency on protobuf.h
(I have a change somewhere where I did that, but it was ultimately not
needed).  Would that help?  The protobuf.h code would still need to be made
available somehow.

On Mon, Jul 18, 2016 at 5:31 PM, Andrew Harp notifications@github.com
wrote:

> It's generated by the cc_binary tool gen_proto_text_functions, which only
> uses the following basic TF includes:
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/lib/strings/str_util.h"
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/lib/strings/strcat.h"
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/macros.h"
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/types.h"
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/init_main.h"
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/logging.h"
> #include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/protobuf.h"
> 
> The entirety of platformlib apart from protos_cc should not be required
> for this binary, so maybe there is some way to refactor the targets
> involved.
>
